configuration.docstring: Perform typed named entity recognition, extracting entities according to the type definitions

entity_definitions.person-actor: An actor or actress in film, television, or theater.
entity_definitions.person-artist/author: A creative artist, writer, or author.
entity_definitions.person-athlete: A professional or amateur sports player.
entity_definitions.person-director: A film, television, or theater director.
entity_definitions.person-politician: A political figure or government official.
entity_definitions.person-other: Other individuals not fitting specific person categories.
entity_definitions.location-GPE: A geo-political entity like a country, state, or city.
entity_definitions.location-bodiesofwater: A named body of water like an ocean, sea, river, or lake.
entity_definitions.location-mountain: A named mountain, mountain range, or hill.
entity_definitions.location-park: A named park, nature reserve, or recreational area.
entity_definitions.location-road/railway/highway/transit: A named road, railway, highway, or transit route.
entity_definitions.organization-education: An educational institution like a university or school.
entity_definitions.organization-media/newspaper: A media outlet, newspaper, or broadcast company.
entity_definitions.organization-sportsleague: A sports league or athletic organization.
entity_definitions.building-hospital: A named hospital or medical facility.
entity_definitions.building-hotel: A named hotel or lodging establishment.
entity_definitions.building-restaurant: A named restaurant or dining establishment.
entity_definitions.building-sportsfacility: A named sports stadium, arena, or facility.
entity_definitions.building-theater: A named theater or performance venue.
entity_definitions.art-music: A musical work, song, or album.
entity_definitions.art-writtenart: A book, poem, or other written work.
entity_definitions.product-airplane: A named aircraft or airplane model.
entity_definitions.product-car: A named car or vehicle model.
entity_definitions.product-food: A named food product or brand.
entity_definitions.product-game: A named game or video game.
entity_definitions.product-software: A named software product or application.
entity_definitions.product-train: A named train or railway vehicle.
entity_definitions.product-weapon: A named weapon or weapons system.
entity_definitions.event-attack/battle/war/militaryconflict: A military conflict, battle, or attack.
entity_definitions.other-biologything: A biological entity such as a species or organism.
entity_definitions.other-disease: A named disease or medical condition.
entity_definitions.other-god: A deity or god from mythology or religion.
entity_definitions.other-law: A named law or legal document.
entity_definitions.other-livingthing: Other living things not covered by biologything.
